title: Virtual Machines üñ•Ô∏è
ques: What is the Azure equivalent of AWS EC2 for running virtualized servers?
explanation: Azure VMs give you the flexibility of virtualization for a wide range of computing solutions.

title: Blob Storage ‚òÅÔ∏è
ques: Which Azure service is optimized for storing massive amounts of unstructured data, such as text or binary data?
explanation: Blob Storage is designed for serving images, documents, streaming video, and performing big data analysis.

title: Azure Functions ‚ö°
ques: What is Microsoft's serverless compute service that enables you to run event-triggered code without having to explicitly provision infrastructure?
explanation: Azure Functions allows you to build applications faster by handling the infrastructure for you.

title: Azure SQL Database üóÑÔ∏è
ques: Which fully managed Platform as a Service (PaaS) database engine handles most of the database management functions like upgrading and patching?
explanation: Azure SQL Database is a general-purpose relational database service based on the latest stable version of Microsoft SQL Server.

title: Resource Groups üìÇ
ques: What is the logical container in Azure that holds related resources for an Azure solution?
explanation: Resource Groups help you manage and organize your Azure resources. You can deploy, update, and delete all resources in a group in a single operation.
